Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Guang Shen International Hotel in Shenzhen (Luohu), you'll be minutes from Luohu Commercial City and close to Hong Kong Golf Club. This hotel is within close proximity of International Foreign Trade Center and Luohu Port.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 155 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Treat yourself with massages, body treatments, and facials. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and an arcade/game room.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Guang Shen International Hotel in Shenzhen (Luohu), you'll be minutes from Luohu Commercial City and close to Hong Kong Golf Club. This hotel is within close proximity of International Foreign Trade Center and Luohu Port.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Luohu Commercial City - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
International Foreign Trade Center - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Luohu Port - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Shun Hing Square - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Shenzhen Grand Theater - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Dongmen Pedestrian Street - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Shenzhen Museum - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Lizhi Park - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Shenzhen People's Park - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Shenzhen Huaqiang North Commercial Circle - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Shenzhen Stadium - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Huanggang Port - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Hong Kong Golf Club - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Huanggang Border Crossing - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Shenzhen Art Museum - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi

The preferred airport for Guang Shen International Hotel is Shenzhen (SZX-Shenzhen Intl.) - 32.6 km / 20.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
